title: Head of the Child Horus
description:
White marble head of the child Horus in the Greek style. Presumably from a statuette.  Short curly hair with band around head.  Full childish features.  Identification based on remains of finger held to mouth.
Condition:  Surface of head worn.  Good workmanship.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
